item.title: [PI] Smithing Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

case 3044: if(itemId == 17648) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSmithing] >= 95) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(17658, 10) { c.getItems().deleteItem(17648, c.getItems().getItemSlot(17648, 10); c.getItems().addItem(17668,1); c.sendMessage("You make a Dragon Bar!"); c.getPA().addSkillXP(500 * Config.SMITHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerSmithing); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 10 bars to smelt this."): } } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Smithing level of 95 to create a Dragon Bar."); } } break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Smithing Help
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Ok, so I have it where you smelt 1 ore you get 1 bar. I was wondering if anyone knew how to make it require 10 ores to smelt 1 bar. This is my code at the moment. case 3044: if(itemId == 17648) { if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSmithing] >= 95) c.getItems().deleteItem(17648, c.getItems().getItemSlot(17648),10); c.getItems().addItem(17668,1); c.sendMessage("You make a dragon bar!"); c.getPA().addSkillXP(500 * Config.SMITHING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerSmithing);*/ } else { c.sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 95 to create a dragon bar."); } break; Please help! I can’t figure our the ore requirement…

Read full topic
